about_the_game:
About
Cumming of Age is a visual novel game with a touch of resource management. In ancient Greece, you are surrounded by beautiful goddesses, attractive mythological creatures, enchanting soundtracks, and entertaining dialogues. You can upgrade your skills and earn your keep while building up your reputation with goddesses. There are Easter eggs, juicy gossip, and lewd details hidden around the city for you to find out.

Story
You are a young man who is trying his best to earn the blessing of goddesses to complete his ‘’coming of age’’ ceremony, but of course it’s not as easy as it sounds. You don't have much time to complete the tasks given to you and finish the ceremony. But if you use your time well and play your cards right, who knows what the goddesses might offer you other than blessings?

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Adult Only Sexual Content

This game includes ancient Greek goddesses, creatures and humanoids graphically depicted in inappropriate positions.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu >= 20.04, Arch, or similar
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 14.5
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Cumming of Age

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A young man prepares for his "Coming of Age" ceremony by getting blessings of the ancient Greek goddesses. A rich lewd visual novel about Greek mythology.
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
